title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka: The Rani's Delight
materials: brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Natural Pearl drop.
features: Classic Jhumka design with a modern twist. Features a delicate floral motif studded with sparkling CZ and crowned with a vibrant Emerald. The pearl drop adds a touch of South Indian elegance. Micro-pav√© setting technique enhances the brilliance of the stones. Features an elegant design of an open crown under the emerald. Hyderabadi Polish enhances gold color.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Ugadi
or a South Indian wedding (Pellikuthuru). Also suitable for evening gatherings or adding a touch of glamour to everyday wear.
description: A beautiful fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The high-quality materials and exquisite craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty. The emerald adds a touch of regality, while the pearl provides a timeless appeal. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
